alert.note: Alert for Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued October 29 at 8:59PM PDT until October 30 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 35 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Northern Humboldt Coast, Southwestern Humboldt, Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior and Mendocino Coast Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 9 AM PDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will be similar to last night and only localized areas away from the coast are expected to see frost.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Mendocino Coast; Northern Humboldt Coast; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southwestern Humboldt
